scripts.precommit:run: [[ ! -z $(git ls-files -m ./$_target) ]] && (npm --prefix ./$_target run precommit && git add ./$_target/package*.json) || echo $_target skipped
scripts.precommit: npm run precommit:back && npm run precommit:front -s && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add ./package*.json
